summary: This is an email from an unidentified individual to attorney Brad Edwards, expressing frustration at being ignored and referencing involvement in a class action. The email is part of a Proton Mail interface showing a list of previous emails with Edwards.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: The recipient of the email, addressed by the sender who expresses frustration at being ignored and references Edwards having been their attorney for many years.

connections.description: The sender states Brad Edwards was their attorney for many years, though they feel they are now being ignored.

events.title: Sender emails Brad Edwards
events.description: An unidentified individual sends an email to attorney Brad Edwards, pleading for a reply and expressing hurt over being ignored, especially given their involvement in a class action.

events.title: Reference to difficulties since 2016
events.description: The sender references having 'been through' a lot since 2016, though specifics are not provided.

keyFacts: An individual is emailing attorney Brad Edwards, expressing significant distress over being ignored.
The sender claims Brad Edwards was their attorney for many years but has previously 'ghosted' them.
The sender states they are involved in a class action, likely related to the Epstein case.
The email subject line includes the phrase 'Hypocrites, Rapists and Murderers!'
The document shows a list of previous email correspondences between the sender and Brad Edwards dating from January to February 2023.
